verses.verse: In thee, O YY <S%H3068><s%>, do I put my trust <S%H2620><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: let me never <S%H408><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be put to confusion <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me in thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, and cause me to escape <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8762><s%>: incline <S%H5186><s%> <S%H8685><s%> thine ear <S%H241><s%> unto me, and save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me.

Be thou my strong <S%H6697><s%> habitation <S%H4583><s%>, whereunto I may continually <S%H8548><s%> resort <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%>: thou hast given Mitzvah <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> to save <S%H3467><s%> <S%H8687><s%> me; for thou art my rock <S%H5553><s%> and my fortress <S%H4686><s%>.

Deliver <S%H6403><s%> <S%H8761><s%> me, O my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, out of the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%>, out of the hand <S%H3709><s%> of the unrighteous <S%H5765><s%> <S%H8764><s%> and cruel man <S%H2556><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.
For thou art my hope <S%H8615><s%>, O YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>: thou art my trust <S%H4009><s%> from my youth <S%H5271><s%>.

By thee have I been holden up <S%H5564><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from the womb <S%H990><s%>: thou art he that took <S%H1491><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me out of my mother's <S%H517><s%> bowels <S%H4578><s%>: my praise <S%H8416><s%> shall be continually <S%H8548><s%> of thee.
I am as a wonder <S%H4159><s%> unto many <S%H7227><s%>; but thou art my strong <S%H5797><s%> refuge <S%H4268><s%>.
Let my mouth <S%H6310><s%> be filled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8735><s%> with thy praise <S%H8416><s%> and with thy honour <S%H8597><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>.

Cast me not off <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> in the time <S%H6256><s%> of old age <S%H2209><s%>; forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me not when my strength <S%H3581><s%> faileth <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

For mine enemies <S%H341><s%> <S%H8802><s%> speak <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> against me; and they that lay wait <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8802><s%> for my soul <S%H5315><s%> take counsel <S%H3289><s%> <S%H8738><s%> together <S%H3162><s%>,

Saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> hath forsaken <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him: persecute <S%H7291><s%> <S%H8798><s%> and take <S%H8610><s%> <S%H8798><s%> him; for there is none to deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8688><s%> him.
O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, be not far <S%H7368><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from me: O my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, make haste <S%H2363><s%> <S%H8798><s%> <S%H8675><s%> <S%H2439><s%> for my help <S%H5833><s%>.

Let them be confounded <S%H954><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and consumed <S%H3615><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that are adversaries <S%H7853><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to my soul <S%H5315><s%>; let them be covered <S%H5844><s%> <S%H8799><s%> with reproach <S%H2781><s%> and dishonour <S%H3639><s%> that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
But I will hope <S%H3176><s%> <S%H8762><s%> continually <S%H8548><s%>, and will yet praise <S%H8416><s%> thee more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8689><s%> and more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8689><s%>.

My mouth <S%H6310><s%> shall shew forth <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> and thy salvation <S%H8668><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%>; for I know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the numbers <S%H5615><s%> thereof.

I will go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the YY <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%>: I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%>, even of thine only.

O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thou hast taught <S%H3925><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me from my youth <S%H5271><s%>: and hitherto have I declared <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy wondrous works <S%H6381><s%> <S%H8737><s%>.

Now also when <S%H5704><s%> I am old <S%H2209><s%> and grayheaded <S%H7872><s%>, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, forsake <S%H5800><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me not; until I have shewed <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thy strength <S%H2220><s%> unto this generation <S%H1755><s%>, and thy power <S%H1369><s%> to every one that is to come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> also, O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, is very high <S%H4791><s%>, who hast done <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> great things <S%H1419><s%>: O 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, who is like unto thee!

Thou, which hast shewed <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8689><s%> me great <S%H7227><s%> and sore <S%H7451><s%> troubles <S%H6869><s%>, shalt quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and shalt bring me up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> from the depths <S%H8415><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>.
Thou shalt increase <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8686><s%> my greatness <S%H1420><s%>, and comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me on every side <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8735><s%>.

I will also praise <S%H3034><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee with the psaltery <S%H3627><s%> <S%H8676><s%> <S%H5035><s%>, even thy truth <S%H571><s%>, O my 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: unto thee will I sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%> with the harp <S%H3658><s%>, O thou Holy One <S%H6918><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

My lips <S%H8193><s%> shall greatly rejoice <S%H7442><s%> <S%H8762><s%> when I sing <S%H2167><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto thee; and my soul <S%H5315><s%>, which thou hast redeemed <S%H6299><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

My tongue <S%H3956><s%> also shall talk <S%H1897><s%> <S%H8799><s%> of thy righteousness <S%H6666><s%> all the day <S%H3117><s%> long: for they are confounded <S%H954><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, for they are brought unto shame <S%H2659><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, that seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> my hurt <S%H7451><s%>.
